title: Return to an existing claim
p1: You’ll need to use either a ‘save and return number’ or your new ‘Employment Tribunal account’ to return to an existing claim.
p2: Have you got a ‘save and return number’ or a new ‘Employment Tribunal account’?
p3: Don't have these details Start a new claim.
optionText1: I’ve got a ‘save and return number’
optionText2: I’ve got a new ‘Employment Tribunal account’

returnToExisting.required: Tell us if you have a save and return number or an Employment Tribunal account
